p:
Convalescent plasma administration seems to be a safe procedure free from serious adverse effects. Meticulous selection of donors can minimize the risk of TRALI. Another potentially concerning phenomenon pertains to antibody-dependent enhancement (ADE) of coronavirus entry. This has been reported in viral diseases and refers to an enhancement of disease in the presence of certain antibodies.
44 Keeping in mind the high titers of neutralizing antibodies that convalescent plasma includes against the same virus (SARS-CoV-2), as well as the previously documented safe experience in SARS and MERS, the occurrence of ADE does not seem to represent a major problem; however, surveillance is warranted.
